title: Whole baked sea bream with a spinach, new potato and parsley salad
description: Lemon and chilli add a kick to this super-simple fish dish. Once cooked, the fillets of the sea bream will easily pull away from the bones making it easy to serve – and eat.
ingredients: 2 whole sea bream, gutted and cleaned
2 garlic cloves, peeled and roughly chopped
1 small onion or leek, thickly sliced
